resources.string:
ॐ तत् सत्॥ Shall we update your Stardict dictionary files? (Details: dict-update-app ) 
 This program downloads latest dictionary files from the internet, and stores it in the folder you will select when you hit the Proceed button. This can then be used by your Stardict apps to use. 
 (This is only a dictionary updater software. You NEED some Stardict-compatible dictionary utility (Eg: ebdic [Rated high], ColorDict, GoldenDict, GoldenDict paid …) separately.) 
 Please scroll + select the dictionary lists you want to use, then click the button.

We\'re done!! Get a stardict-compatible dictionary app (eg: Eg: ebdic [Rated high], Goldendict paid, ColorDict), if you don\'t already have one. Then point it to the %s directory; finally reindex all your dictionaries.
